info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN INDIANA...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND...SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHEASTERN ARMSTRONG AND FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Blairsville to near Scottdale to near Masontown. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Indiana, Uniontown, Latrobe, Connellsville, Homer City, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, Derry, and Lawson Heights. This includes Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 78 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
